Submodules¶

src.discograph module¶

src.discograph.discograph()¶

Main function to run the discograph application. This function initializes the SQLite database connection, begins a cursor session, and provides a menu for the user to explore the discography tool.

Module contents¶

discograph package

This file marks the ‘discograph’ directory as a Python package.
